title: [SPOILERS] Recording my SO's reactions
body:
Hey!

Like the title says, im recording my SO’s reactions to various scenes, currently rewatching the series with her, beacuse it’s her first time watching Got.

Could any of you have an idea of what scenes to record her reaction too? Already got ned starks scene and the dragons being born.

Planning to upload them to YouTube also, so i want to get the best scenes!

Thanks in advance!



Source: https://ift.tt/2NEaXUR

blog.name: seleya
blog.title: Alas, A Tumblr
blog.description: Canadian. INTJ. Old enough to remember the ‘80s. GOT multi-shipper.

question: Cersei!
answer:
character: hate them | don’t really care | like them | LOVE them | THEY ARE MY PRECIOUS

ship with: Jon, Ned, Jaime

friendship them with: Qyburn. I think he’s the only friend she has on the show. She’s actually quite isolated, and while part of that is a result of her own paranoia and pettiness, it’s also due to circumstances beyond her control. I’m reminded of that scene where she tells Tyrion “he [Joffrey] was all I had once.” Men have made her choices for her for most of her adult life. She was Tywin Lannister’s daughter, then Robert Baratheon’s wife, then Tywin Lannister’s daughter again, and thus it’s understandable to me that she took solace in her relationship with Jaime, because it was a rare thing she got to choose. And yet, despite having all the power in the world and a legion of vassals and servants, she lacks a true confidante, and that’s a terrible place for anyone to be, let alone some so prone to being ruled by their worst impulses.

general opinions: I could write a treatise on my thoughts on Cersei. I’ve probably done so over the course of replying to comments on TWTWGM. I love how, as a character, she’s both deeply unpleasant and profoundly relatable, because that’s something female characters so rarely get to be.

Thanks for the ask! <3

put a character in my ask

title: [SPOILERS] Red Woman in Ep. 7 S. 4?
body:
Shes taking a bath at the 24:00 min mark and does not (DOES NOT) have the necklace on? But her titties are firm? So confused, can someone please clarify?

Does her witch power turn on and off based on her wearing of the necklace?

7 blessings
